message:
kiusikkho age amar alakay kisu polapan dokan path gari vangchur kore...eder k ami khub valo kore chini jara chatro league er kormi...khub obak laglo era vangchur er somoy mathay tupi pore vangchu korse.....ghotona akhanei ses na kisukkhon por police eshe amader arear kisu tablig er luk dhore nia gese....
fan post
